translation: He is deathless and a non-temporal Entity.
He is Imperceptible Purusha, Unmanifested and Unscathed.

gurmukhi: jwq pwq ijh ichn n brnw ]
transliteration: Jaat Paat Jhi Chihan Na Barnaa||
translation: He Who is without caste, lineage, mark and colour.
The Unmanifest Lord is Indestructible and ever Stable.9.

gurmukhi: sB ko kwl sBn ko krqw ]
transliteration: Sabh Ko Kaal Sabhan Ko Kartaa||
translation: He is the Destroyer of all and Creator of all.
He is the Remover of maladies, sufferings and blemishes.

gurmukhi: eyk ic`q ijh iek iCn iDAwieE ]
transliteration: Ek Chitt Jih Ik Chin Dhiaaio||
translation: He Who meditates upon Him with single mind even for an instant;

gurmukhi: kwl Pws ky bIc n AwieE ]10]
transliteration: Kaal Phaas Ke Boodhe Na Aaio||10||
translation: He doth not come within the trap of death. 10.

gurmukhi: kqhUM sucyq huie kY cyqnw ko cwr kIE kqhUM AicMq huie kY sovq Acyq ho ]
transliteration: Kat-hoon Souchet Hue Kai Chetnaa Ko Chaar Kooo, Kat-hoon Achint He Kai Sovat Ache3t Ho||
translation: O Lord! Somewhere becoming Conscious, Thou adrnest consciousness; somewhere becoming Carefree, thou sleepest unconsciously.

gurmukhi: kqhUM iBKwrI huie kY mwNgq iPrq BIK khUM mhw dwn huie kY mwNigE Dn dyq ho ]
transliteration: Kat-hoon Bhikhdaroo Hue Kai Maanad Phirat Bhookh, Kahoon Mahaa Daan Hue Kai Manio Dhan Det Ho||
translation: Somewhere becoming a beggar, Thou beggest alms and somewhere becoming a Supreme Donor, Thou bestowest the begged wealth.

gurmukhi: khUM mhwN rwjn ko dIjq AnMq dwn khUM mhwN rwjn qy CIn iCq lyq ho ]
transliteration: Kahoon Mahaan Raajan Ko Doojat Anant Daan, Kahoon Mahaan Raajan Te Chhodhn Chit Let Ho||
translation: Some where Thou givest inexhaustible gifts to emperors and somewhere Thou deprivest the emperors of their kingdoms.

gurmukhi: khUM byd rIq khUM qw isau ibpRIq khUM qiRgun AqIq khUM surgu n smyq ho ]1]11]
transliteration: Kahoon Bed Root Kahoon Taa Sio Biproot|| Kaboon Atoot Kahoon Surgoun Samet Ho||1||11
translation: Somewhere Thou workest in accordance with Vedic rites and somewhere Thou art quite opposed to it; somewhere Thou art without three modes of maya and somewhere Thou hast all godly attributes.1.11.

gurmukhi: khUM j`C gMpRb aurg khUM ibidAwDr khUM Bey ikMnr ipswc khUM pRyq ho ]
transliteration: Kahoon Jachchh Gaddhrab Urg Kahoon Bidyaadhar Kahoon Bhae Kinnarpisaanch Kahoon Pret Ho||
translation: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art Yaksha, Gandharva, Sheshanaga and Vidyadhar and somewhere Thou becomest Kinnar, Pishacha and Preta.
